trans-unit.source: Prepare Connectivity to SAP ABAP Systems

seg-source.mrk: Prepare Connectivity to SAP ABAP Systems

trans-unit.source: To be able to successfully validate and use a connection to an SAP ABAP system for remote tables or data flows, certain preparations have to be made.

seg-source.mrk: To be able to successfully validate and use a connection to an SAP ABAP system for remote tables or data flows, certain preparations have to be made.

target.mrk: 원격 테이블 또는 데이터 흐름을 위한 SAP ABAP 시스템 연결을 확인하고 사용하기 위해서는 특정한 준비 작업이 필요합니다.

trans-unit.source: See also: SAP Note <sap-note>2835207</sap-note> (<cite>ABAP connection type for SAP Data Intelligence</cite>)

seg-source.mrk: SAP Note <sap-note>2835207</sap-note> (<cite>ABAP connection type for SAP Data Intelligence</cite>)

target.mrk: SAP Note <sap-note>2835207</sap-note>(<cite>ABAP connection type for SAP Data Intelligence</cite>)

trans-unit.source: For SAP S/4HANA, source version 1909 FPS01 plus SAP Note <sap-note>2873666</sap-note> or higher versions are supported.

seg-source.mrk: For SAP S/4HANA, source version 1909 FPS01 plus SAP Note <sap-note>2873666</sap-note> or higher versions are supported.

target.mrk: SAP S/4HANA의 경우, 소스 버전 1909 FPS01과 SAP Note <sap-note>2873666</sap-note> 이상 버전이 지원됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When connecting to SAP LT Replication Server:<!--hub system-->

seg-source.mrk: When connecting to SAP LT Replication Server:

target.mrk: SAP LT Replication Server에 연결 시:

trans-unit.source: Connectivity to SAP LT Replication Server is supported for:

seg-source.mrk: Connectivity to SAP LT Replication Server is supported for:

target.mrk: SAP LT Replication Server로의 연결은 다음 시스템에서 지원됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Systems with Addon DMIS 2011 Support Package 19 or higher (supporting SAP ECC 6.00 or higher<!--or SAP ECC running on NetWeaver 7.00 or higher, or internally also referred to as SAP ECC 7.00 or higher-->)<!--(incl. BW systems on the respective ECC state)-->

seg-source.mrk: Systems with Addon DMIS 2011 Support Package 19 or higher (supporting SAP ECC 6.00 or higher<!--or SAP ECC running on NetWeaver 7.00 or higher, or internally also referred to as SAP ECC 7.00 or higher-->)
seg-source.ph: <!--(incl. BW systems on the respective ECC state)-->

target.mrk: DMIS 애드온 2011 지원 패키지 19 이상이 적용된 시스템(SAP ECC 6.00 이상 버전<!--or SAP ECC running on NetWeaver 7.00 or higher, or internally also referred to as SAP ECC 7.00 or higher-->지원)
target.ph: <!--(incl. BW systems on the respective ECC state)-->

trans-unit.source: Systems with Addon DMIS 2018 Support Package 4 or higher (supporting SAP S/4HANA 1709 or higher<!--or SAP ECC running on NetWeaver 7.52, or internally also referred to as higher SAP ECC 7.52 or higher-->)

seg-source.mrk: Systems with Addon DMIS 2018 Support Package 4 or higher (supporting SAP S/4HANA 1709 or higher<!--or SAP ECC running on NetWeaver 7.52, or internally also referred to as higher SAP ECC 7.52 or higher-->)

target.mrk: DMIS 애드온 2018 지원 패키지 4 이상이 적용된 시스템(SAP ECC 1709 이상 버전<!--or SAP ECC running on NetWeaver 7.52, or internally also referred to as higher SAP ECC 7.52 or higher-->지원)

trans-unit.source: Source systems connected to an SAP LT Replication Server are supported down to:

seg-source.mrk: Source systems connected to an SAP LT Replication Server are supported down to:

target.mrk: SAP LT Replication Server에 연결된 소스 시스템은 다음과 같이 지원됩니다.

trans-unit.source: In the ABAP-based system in which SAP LT Replication Server is installed, an administrator has created a configuration to specify the source system, the SAP LT Replication Server system and <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> as target system.

seg-source.mrk: In the ABAP-based system in which SAP LT Replication Server is installed, an administrator has created a configuration to specify the source system, the SAP LT Replication Server system and <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/> as target system.

target.mrk: SAP LT Replication Server가 설치된 ABAP 기반 시스템에서 관리자가 소스 시스템, SAP LT Replication Server 시스템 및 <pname conkeyref="loio355f3590b9984e58929515541d44e10e/SAP-DWC-LONG"/>를 대상 시스템으로 지정하는 구성을 생성한 상태여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/007c373fcacb4003b990c6fac29a26e4/latest/en-US/5a3be474248e4d758ba09a3d292ff1dc.html" scope="external">Creating a Configuration</xref> in the <cite>SAP Landscape Transformation Replication Server</cite> documentation.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/007c373fcacb4003b990c6fac29a26e4/latest/en-US/5a3be474248e4d758ba09a3d292ff1dc.html" scope="external">Creating a Configuration</xref> in the <cite>SAP Landscape Transformation Replication Server</cite> documentation.

target.mrk: 자세한 내용은 <cite>SAP Landscape Transformation Replication Server</cite> 문서의 <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/007c373fcacb4003b990c6fac29a26e4/latest/en-US/5a3be474248e4d758ba09a3d292ff1dc.html" scope="external">구성 생성</xref>을 참조하십시오.

trans-unit.source: When connecting to SAP S/4HANA Cloud, an administrator has created a communication arrangement for the communication scenario <sap-technical-name> SAP_COM_0532</sap-technical-name> (<cite>SAP Data Hub – ABAP CDS Pipeline Integration</cite>) in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system.

seg-source.mrk: When connecting to SAP S/4HANA Cloud, an administrator has created a communication arrangement for the communication scenario <sap-technical-name> SAP_COM_0532</sap-technical-name> (<cite>SAP Data Hub – ABAP CDS Pipeline Integration</cite>) in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system.

target.mrk: SAP S/4HANA Cloud에 연결하는 경우, 관리자가 SAP S/4HANA Cloud 시스템에서 통신 시나리오 <sap-technical-name> SAP_COM_0532</sap-technical-name>(<cite>SAP Data Hub – ABAP CDS 파이프라인 통합</cite>)에 대한 통신 규약을 생성한 상태여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/latest/en-US/f509eddda867452db9631dae1ae442a3.html" scope="external">Integrating CDS Views Using ABAP CDS Pipeline</xref> in the <cite>SAP S/4HANA Cloud </cite>documentation.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/latest/en-US/f509eddda867452db9631dae1ae442a3.html" scope="external">Integrating CDS Views Using ABAP CDS Pipeline</xref> in the <cite>SAP S/4HANA Cloud </cite>documentation.

target.mrk: 자세한 정보는 <cite>SAP S/4HANA Cloud</cite> 문서의 <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/latest/en-US/f509eddda867452db9631dae1ae442a3.html" scope="external">ABAP CDS 파이프라인을 사용하여 CDS 뷰 통합</xref>을 참조하십시오.
